item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/10/02/startup-podcast/#comment-4260">Pete</a>.
He definitely knows how to tell a story. I could sit and listen to these one right after another ( like burning through a whole season of a tv show on Netflix in one night ).
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Pete.

He definitely knows how to tell a story. I could sit and listen to these one right after another ( like burning through a whole season of a tv show on Netflix in one night ).

item.title: By: Pete
item.dc:creator: Pete
item.description:
Nicely put. I completely agree.
The serialized cliff-hanging what-happens-next feeling is something I haven't experienced in audio in a long time.
item.content:encoded:
Nicely put. I completely agree.

The serialized cliff-hanging what-happens-next feeling is something I haven’t experienced in audio in a long time.
